description: A simple map of traffic lights in #Bangalore shown as points.
Towns of Mexico
Maps with all the trajectories of hurricanes and tropical storms that have passed near Mexico since these events have been measured. IBTrACS data.
High Points in the Southern Alps. Some fun using blending modes to combine hill height points and a Southern Alps hillshade.
Most reviewed eating places in Tbilisi
This aviation map shows RNAV routes (mainly flown using GPS). Even though this version is for Nov 5 and I left 1.5 years ago 90% of it I made about 8 years ago or more so I think it counts 😬
Showing the different approaches in USA when it comes to measles and vaccinations.

#30DayMapChallenge day 3 (polygons): I took the 2019 school census dataset from @DataMillNorth https://t.co/2c6OzDvTd6 and mapped pupils who are eligible for free school meals using my CSV2GeoJSON tool https://t.co/M6HwDIYg2Z
The route of the Lord Melville, the first all-female convict ship, departed from Gravesend in August 1816 (the year with no summer) and arrived in Port Jackson in February 1817.

Hello Chandigarh Roads. Thanks for reminding us what  India can achieve when there is a will to plan and implement the plans. Chandigarh is a stark visual outlier with its even and perfectly squared road network.
In CDMX there are 99 public places with free WIFI connection. Source: datos abiertos cdmx
Lighthouses of Great Britain
Hunting out new and interesting data sources is another great part of this challenge! Yesterday I came across @protectedplanet WDPA Protected Areas data so made some quick #QGIS maps
The map displays a 3 year history of cyclone tracks in the region. Cyclone tracks from ibtracs.
California State borders made with #usgs elevation data using the incredible R rayshader package
I've gone for Road traffic accidents in Central London per LSOA centroid - finished off with a little helping of @sarahbellmaps BellTopo Sans.
#points #Hexagon #MAppEnterprise
GB Districts with 'land' in their name. Data courtesy @undertheraedar & @OrdnanceSurvey
Temperature reductions in Iceland during the solar eclipse, 20 March 2015
I mapped the buildings in Manchester, New Hampshire's Historic Millyard using the mood-enhancing @John_M_Nelson Felt Style.

I am fascinated by water so for the point day, I decided to make a map of all the springs and boreholes according to Israel's Water Authority. They're not necessarily flowing or active, but even so, a lot to learn about the geohydrology of the region here.
A simple map shows the population of child under 5 years old in ALBAHA province, KSA.
It's points today, correct?
Africa Global Terrorism Database 1970-2018; Données Actualisées
Here's a map of every UK location named something-Point from GeoNames.
The Disunited States of America.
This is a play on fractals and the other united colors of... Arguably more graphic than a map.

This year @osm_ie launched the #osmIRL_buildings project, to map every building in Ireland. Four counties are already completed. This month they are publishing a mapping task every day. Great time to contribute to your #OpenStreetMap community.
Some of my favorite #roadcycling routes in my area, made with google maps using gpx files from Strava
Greenspace sites in #Glasgow city and surrounding area
Line work (pointstopath) of address records from Day 1 - (1/2)

I was so excited to participate in the #30DayMapChallenge I totally missed that it starts in November and not, like, right now. Uh. Maybe you want to know how close you are to a ballot drop box anyway?

Topical map for today's election or why counties are a bad base unit for anything. These maps have the same style so you can see why if you live in a green state no one bothers to campaign there as there are several counties that are bigger.
I used data from @openstreetmap and #QGIS to visualize schools in Europe. It kind of displays the population density of children and teenagers in the continent.
Map of Chile with the location and average annual flow (lts / sec) of the water rights capture points in Chile (yes, we are the only country with privatized water). "It is not drought, it is looting"
Map of the entire hydrographic network of Chile , perfect complement to the map of day 1 and to other maps on environmental conflict and urban development.
Map showing the places of accidents in Paris according to public lighting. Data: https://opendata.paris
I visualized the shelter in my city and using Leaflet.js and D3.js. Point data is Kawagoe City shelter open data, basemap is OpenStreetMap.
A love story about pies.
Populated Places - New Zealand. Unified English Braille

#MelchiorBolstra, Map of #Haarlemmermeer, Amsterdam: Hendrik de Leth, c. 1740. The dotted lines show the outlines of the lake from 1531 to 1740. Because of its growth, the lake was nicknamed 'Waterwolf'.

Map of flow of trips by bus that we did with @chicajuntada. We use a bit of R to process the data, and then QGIS (geometry generator to bend the lines since they are only source - destination and add blend mode)
Shelter centre of Bangladesh Coastal Region.
Progression of lava flows during the 2018 Puna eruption of Kilauea. @USGS @USGSVolcanoes data.
Earthquakes from 1959 to 2020. Data from USGS and OpenStreetMap contributors
Eelevation in tyne and wear
Forest cover of the Breisgau-Hochschwarzwald county
Population of Malaysia in 2020: 32.58 million.. (One random point created per 100 people)
Singapore LRT/MRT
Port of Beirut Explosion in 2020
Where has gold been mined in the U.S.?
2016 Presidential Elections: % of Democratic votes by county
2016 Presidential Elections: % of Republican votes by county
Another view of the Montreal metro lines.
All the trees in my garden. Measured from orthophoto, created with #QGIS. Tree symbol drawn by hand and changed to .svg with #Inkscape.
Garden as hexagons. Analysing the landuse in my garden with simple overlay. Other area = still some work to do. Could have just made some hexagon flower beds.
a line connecting those two thousand five hundred random points by their random id.
Map below of Gaeltacht areas around the Island of Ireland ☘️
These are all the buildings in #Southampton, UK, coloured by the time taken to travel from there to the Civic Centre by car to arrive at 9am on a weekday.
#INeedNewShoes #doyouknowthewaytosanjose
Hagley Park Halftone. A pseudo-halftone map of Hagley Park, Christchurch, created with points of cyan, magenta, and yellow (and black text)
Hollow Ways around Tell Beydar in Syria
I thought I'd put some polygons on a spinning globe. Didn't have time to fix the blips but hopefully it's not too hypnotic.
In the database of @openstreetmap there are 16,511 trees registered in the Lima-Callao metropolitan area. Each green dot is a tree. We still have to search quite a few trees 🌴

I am definitely not doing the #30DayMapChallenge because there is an election. But since the first day's theme was points (it's still the first day in Hawaii) and I was thinking about polling booth locations here's all of them. It's essentially population density but 🤷‍♂️
Theft in public transport 2016 -2020 CDMX
304 municipalities. 6 regions. A polygon map to see the puzzle that is Zamora
Tree tops in Avonhead, Christchurch. Recovered from LiDAR canopy height model (in grey), still tweaking the algorithm. Big white section is Crosby Park.
